dimensions.label: Social Dynamics Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will foster a sense of community and work together with others to achieve common goals.
Your FarTwin will focus on individual achievements and strive to outdo others in various endeavors.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin showcase their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will express themselves through engaging conversations, using humor and wit to connect with others.
Your FarTwin will showcase their creativity through visual or written art, allowing others to appreciate their unique perspective.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will stand firm in their opinions and express themselves clearly, even in difficult situations.
Your FarTwin will tend to sidestep conflicts or uncomfortable conversations, prioritizing harmony over confrontation.

dimensions.label: Information Gathering
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin gather information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will seek out comprehensive data and analysis, ensuring a well-rounded understanding of the topic.
Your FarTwin will focus on getting an overview of the situation, using intuition and experience to guide their decisions.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be adaptable and adjust to changing circumstances, focusing on the task at hand.
Your FarTwin will maintain a rigid schedule and adhere to deadlines, ensuring efficiency and productivity.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving Philosophy
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on reason and evidence to find solutions, analyzing data and considering multiple perspectives.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and experience, allowing themselves the freedom to explore novel ideas.

dimensions.label: Network Building Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin expand their social network?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize quality over quantity, focusing on meaningful relationships and connections.
Your FarTwin will strive to meet as many new people as possible, fostering a diverse network of contacts.

dimensions.label: Idea Generation Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin come up with innovative ideas?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into smaller parts, analyzing each component to find novel solutions.
Your FarTwin will focus on free-associating and exploring new ideas, allowing themselves the freedom to think outside the box.
